question:
Consider the following statements about the Zonal Council:
  1. Union Home Minister is the Chairperson of the Zonal Council
  2. Each Zonal Council is statutory body and is primarily an advisory body
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The zonal council meeting is organized on the same lines as the inter-state council meeting, and is chaired by the union home minister. The idea of creation of Zonal Councils was first of all mooted by the first Prime Minister of India, Pandit Jawahar Lal Nehru in 1956. The zonal councils have been established by the state reorganization act 1956. Five Zonal Councils (Northern, Western, Eastern, Central and Southern) were set up under the States Reorganization Act, 1956 to foster Inter-State co-operation and co-ordination among the States. The Zonal Councils are mandated to discuss and make recommendations on any matter of common interest in the field of economic and social planning, border disputes, linguistic minorities or inter-State transport etc.
